name: Charles Coronado
text: Simply awesome pizza with mountain high toppings. Great service. And Holy crap the pow pows are crazy good.

name: Krys Apple
text: I used to order here a couple times a month, but they've gone downhill in the last 3-4 years. They took their tasty calzones off the menu and now serve cheap watery dressing with their wings instead of the thick, chunky bleu cheese. There …More

name: Jenn Coutts
text: We ate here on Christmas Eve. We were surprised but grateful that they were open. We were served quickly and with enthusiasm even though it was already 7:30 in the evening. Had salads and a pizza and both were excellent. The supervisor that …More

name: Salty Dog
text: WOW...What a cool place, really original... had the Paia Pie... excellent Pie, highly recommend. Reminded me of when I was in Italy. The service even better than the pie.... 5 Star... Anthony, Rory, and Tyler took good care of me, First …More

name: Nathan James
text: Well I decided to give them another chance. Went in to sit down at the little bar area. Ordered a drink but the guy helping me (nice guy) wanted me to pay for the drink right then. I asked if I could pay for it after when I payed for my …More

name: H Buels
text: Meh. Decent pizza. Kinda tough like leather. Almost thought it was thin crust. Delivery was fair, guy got lost but was Very nice. The girl on the phone who took the order was nice too. However the price for ONE pizza and a coupon for a FREE pizza came close to $25... I can Not see myself ordering again.

name: Patrick Lives Persona
text: First time there, and the worker named Paul was awesome! He went above and beyond to make sure my girlfriend and I were happy... Ohh yes we were. The Pizza was amazing! 100% satisfied.

name: Ron Sommers
text: 3 hungry guys ate 3 personal pizzas and were entirely satisfied. Not your typical pizzeria. Very tasty pizzas! Unique! Good value for the money too! Oh and they have other menu items such as salads and hoagies! Enough there to please any palate! Staff was excellent.

name: Scared Of Ghosts
text: This place is awesome, and what bums me out is no one knows bout this place..you type food on Google maps and this place doesn't even come up..once you've had it you'll be back, I was..the prices are normal but in terms of taste, its …More

name: Usa Usa
text:
Great service! Awesome pizza and buffalo wings NY style.
The guy at the counter moved from OKC was really helpful, friendly and quick, pizza was extremely fresh and the bone out wings were tender with the right buffalo spice.
⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

name: Brett Barney
text: This place was really good! My only complaint would be their topping placement.  They sit right under the cheese so when you take a bite all the cheese and toppings slide off the slice.  Still really tasty though.

name: Michael Collins
text: Hands down the best pizza I've had since I've been in Colorado. Speedy , nice delivery to tip it off. Thanks

name: Jared Bussiere
text: Delicious pizza everytime! Pizzas are made with a butter coated dough that has medium sized crusts. The only sandwich Ive eaten there was the one with buffalo wings on it and it was so good i almost died. Definitely would reccomend

name: Sarah Avalos
text: We ordered 2 personal pizzas to be able to try different styles. Pizza was cooked well and both were flavorful in their unique way. Great choice!

name: Nelson Ishmael
text: One of the many pizza places in Colorado Springs, for me its a great option for the vegan choices. Every vegan pizza is amazing and satisfying. Although the choices are amazing and plenty; the prices are pretty high and the normal wait is gonna be between 45 - 90 minutes.

name: Leo Delati
text: Still the only other place allowed to feed me, if I can't cook it myself. They had a rough day yesterday, thought to give then a second chance. So I came back tonight, and the apology was real. …More

name: Thalia Velasquez
text: Good pizza and excellent buffalo boneless wings. On the pricy side though. Enjoyed the experience but wouldn't really go back.

name: Kristina Hopper
text: Calzones are AMAZING! And great lunch special on pizzas! The staff is great, check them out.

name: K West
text: The pizza was "okay." It should've been GREAT for me paying $17 for a medium,  never again.  Also,  I got 3 options for crust: original, thin, and gluten free. We didn't want thin,  so we got original. We opened the box and would swear it …More

name: Dr. Michael Brand
text: Probably the best pizza that I've had in Northern Colorado Springs. The Everest Pizza is a meat lovers dream. The Calzones are huge and stuffed like a Thanksgiving turkey. The service is always friendly and down to Earth. The location is close to all of the shopping centers.

name: Bonita Cooley
text: The gluten-free yard sale pizza is amazingly delicious!! I am definitely coming back. Thanks for the awesome food y'all!

name: little miss unknown
text: I had their one slice screaming tomato pizza for lunch. The tomatoes were fresh and the crust was nice and crisp, with a decent amount of hot melted cheese on top that string when you bite off it. Fast sevice. Definitely coming back.

name: Enigma Wyoming
text: I USED to eat here occasionally until I sat at the counter and watched how my food was made.  First, they keep their dough in a BRUTE garbage can under the counter, then the chef makes the pizza with no gloves, handling raw chicken and …More

name: Sia Knutzen
text:
We have been ordering Extreme Pizza for a while now, and love it!
However, the last time we order with them (4/29/15) the driver forgot our soda. We asked if he would go back to the store to get it for us, and he said no we …More

name: Joseph Hornsey
text: We discovered these guys about a month or two ago and ordered a Yard Sale (with some modifications).  The pizza is absolutely wonderful!  It's our "go to" pizza now. …More

name: Lisa Renee Jones
text: We LOVED this place. But one time we got it and it had only cheese on half. It was delivery. The manager pretty much called us liars. He didn't even want to give us a credit or bring us new pizzas. We'd been fans in Texas and here. So we …More

name: Luis Patino
text: Ordered 2 large pizzas to be delivered and the cheese was still hot when it showed up. The toppings were a little light but over all really good pizza.

name: Cooper Hollmaier
text: I was incredibly disappointed with my experience today at this restaurant. In ordering a pizza with my teammates for lunch, it took almost 2 hours to arrive and we were not compensated for this inconvenience. In addition, after specifically …More

name: Alan Gaddy
text: Try it, you'll like it. These guys make great pizza and offer some interesting specialty options.

name: Scott Hausmann
text: Literally one of the best pizzas I've have had. I travel a lot and have had pizza from a lot of places and this rates at the top. Finally a place I can actually get blue cheese crumbles on a pizza!

name: Sarah Hewett
text: Fantastic food all around, pizza calzones and salads are on point. Love bringing my friends here. Lunch special is also a great deal

name: Robert
text: Radical pizza with a radical name! If you want to get an awesome tasting pizza or just want a nice slice for lunch, look no further than Extreme Pizza! They push your taste buds to the limits!

name: Brad Smith
text: Called in an order, told 15 minutes for pick up.  I always give places 10 more minutes so.  I show up almost 30 minutes later.  No greeting for 5 minutes and no one is inside besides one family eating.  One guy yelled be with you in a …More

name: Jamie Hennigan
text: I had a gift card that I tried to use last week for delivery. After spending 15 minutes on the phone with the rude employee I was informed that I would have to come into the store to use my gift card because they weren't 'set up' to take it …More

name: Jason Bondy
text: I came here with a Groupon....There is no special menu for Groupon's (thank goodness!) Lol They have changed from an order-up-front (like a Panera Bread) to a full service eatery with a server.  Yes, you now have to tip ;-). Still, great pizza and a great, casual place to take the family to eat and not have to clean up dinner at home.

name: Morgan Duhamel
text: Not only did it take an hour and a half to get the pizza, it was not as described on the site, and I paid for bacon and it was no where to be seen. When I called to speak with the manager, she informed me that it was herself that actually …More

name: jetsfanccr1
text: Awesome pizza. Would definitely get it again if i lived here. Ordered delivery and they said 30 to 45 min. It was here in 20.

name: Praveen Kommu
text: Great grab and go casual. My boys loved it. The slices of pizza were huge!  Will be back again

name: Tom Lastname
text: Ordered the spicy buffalo wings and will never do it again.  They took twice as long to BAKE, yes bake.  The skins were scorched black on 1 side and were squishy, not crispy with firm meat.  Many of the wings had broken bones and were of …More

name: John Sherwood
text: Great pizza. Good value. Always friendly.

name: Chris Borror
text: It was pretty good pizza but it took forever to get it. They were very busy the night I was there. Friendly staff though.

name: Eric Kaiser
text: Always Always a great place to be! Staff is fun and pizza is amazing!

name: Cymon Kingery
text: I take my wife and kids here for Sunday night meals. We always have a great time. Good food, great service.

name: Sid White
text: Stayed in a hotel down the road.  Ordered our pizza at almost closing time.  They stayed open late so we could pick our pizza up.  It was excellent.  Wings could be better though.

name: Bryan Jones
text: One of my favorite pizza places. The prices are a bit high but the quality is great and so is the taste. Worth it!

name: Brandi Cane
text: Amazing pizza and the service was phenomenal!  We had a traditional cheese and the recommendation for the adult pizza was great! Happy hour was a perfect match for our pizza dining experience!!!

name: Bryan Spaulding
text: They have upped their quality since I last tried them! delicious MEDIUM sized gluten free pizza are avalible. Before they only had smalls and for limited toppings.

name: Rebecca Read
text: Unique pizza ideas with gluten free options available in one size and with an upcharge.

name: Keith Bush
text: Service is good, place is clean and food is great.  I'm not much of a pizza person but when I get the hankering for pizza, this is where I go!.

name: Micah Cousin
text: a 36 dollar pizza tasted pretty good, but driver only had 4 dollars change and all I had was 40$. really made me wanna throw the pizza at the driver and never order again. the pizza cost 26$ a 10 dollar tip for an overpriced piece of garbage pizza

name: Christopher Casey
text: LET IT BE KNOWN.. this establishment does NOT support our military. I needed a job while in the reserves, and as soon as I told the manager I was active reserves, the interview went down hill and I never received a call back, even after a second attempt.

name: Zachary Southern
text: Great place to grab a quick bite to go or dine in with a beer

name: Renata Templeton
text: Really enjoyed this place.  Different pizza choices, we have loved them all so far!

name: Chandler Crenshaw
text: 0/10 DO NOT RECOMMEND. Total trash. If I could rate 0 stars, I would. Flat, thin, fake dough. Uncooked veggies on my "White Out"..Little Caesers $5 pizzas are better than anything from this garbage joint..The red sauce wasn't even good so …More

name: Bre Boston
text: The pizza is fantastic!! The staff is wonderful and very friendly!! The restaurant is clean. Always a favorite when we visit Colorado!!

name: Michael Williamson
text: Went to order online. See a nice little warning about a $12 minimum. Ok, my order was at $11.70, so I added a chocolate chip cookie. Then, at the end of the process, they only take cash on delivery, no credit card. So, I called to order …More

name: Peter O
text: Great pizza not sure what Extrem about it

name: Christopher Schooley
text: Excellent pizza place, not a great location with all of the "driveway drama" with the many shopping centers on N. Academy. Would love a Powers location.

name: Matt DeCoste
text: I don't know what the last 2 reviewers are smoking but I have been going to this Extreme Pizza for years and never had a bad experience. I have never had them deliver so I cannot comment on order mixups or late delivery. But I do want to be …More

name: Michael Merrell
text:
The speciality pizzas are good but nothing extraordinary as far as taste is concerned.
We had good service except they screwed up our order and had to fix it, which luckily they were able to do quickly with another Pizza they had already started cooking.

name: EAdH Cory
text: Their menu looked promising. We ordered a calzone which was good and the Everest which was okay, but not the best pizza I've ever had. We had stomach issues for an entire day afterward so I don't think we'd ever eat there again.

name: Eric Pack
text: 1 1/2 hour delivery, 3 miles away. I have only ordered delivery twice from this establishment and both times was like watching a slow motion train crash while extremely hungry. First time, long delivery time, and driver delivered the wrong …More

name: Priscilla Soares
text: I love coming here,  always friendly staff & yummy 😋 food!

name: Pamala Campbell
text:
I gave one star because I had to, but I would have preferred  not to give any stars.
We ordered two calzones for delivery, we were told they'd arrive within the hour …More

name: Pierre Castellanos
text: Great environment.Super Friendly staff...and food was good👍

name: Edward Soares
text: The place to go for pizza - now a sit down place with a great, friendly atmosphere and awesome food.

name: Mary Buchanan
text: Pizza was good. However the price was too much for a  normal pizza place

name: Michael Trenkler
text: Pizza was very good, the facility was nice and clean. There was also a TV with live sports playing.

name: kc angelic
text: Drove to the one in Southgate because it said on their website they had vegan pizza. Get there and no one knows what vegan is after explaining it they say they don't have it. Go to the other one up North the only crusts that were vegan were the super small ones and with a $5 off coupon it would have been $28 for 2! Horrible.

name: Tom Tucker
text: Friendly employees, good food!!  Fast and efficient

name: Mr X
text: Excellent pizza & customer service!!

name: Kristy Anderson
text: Good customer service, gluten free pizza was a hit

name: Vance Risinger
text: Very good pizza.  We always get the railroad grade pizza and the kids get the cheese.

name: Ryan Rhodes
text: I am not impressed.  The "monster" sub is a joke.  Tiny and no flavor what so ever.  Our calzone was not cooked through.  When i complained i was told the wait for the calzone would be quite long and that i was out of gas on the sandwich …More

name: Nicole Lomonaco-Sunde
text: Most Awesome Exotic Pizza ever tried plus the Gluten Free is just to die for!!!

name: Dale Wilderness
text: Some of the best pizza I've had!

name: Laura
text: Extreme Pizza used to be worth the pricy menu. Now it's just overpriced.

name: tom hughes
text: Excellent speciality pizzas!

name: Emily
text: We ordered 2 subs and some cheese sticks and spent 26 bucks. Ordered the crux and a meatball sub. Both were extremely tiny, had barely anything on them, and were both burnt. I was extremely disappointed and will not be returning.

name: Arron Russell
text: Says online they could deliver where im at. "not true"They need to fix there delivery website online.....

name: Ein Mack
text: Pizza is the best I've had in Colorado springs

name: mark fruci
text: Crapy food,bad atmosphere

name: FabEsco LMS Inc
text: Ordered 2 pizza 2 hours ago, 5:38pm. I called after an hour to check on the order, was told the order would be here shortly. Here I am another hour later with no idea where the order is. 1star.

name: Rob Stephens
text: Very friendly staff.  Pizza was good.

name: Bo Martinez
text: Closed, unfortunately.

name: Ashley
text: Yum

name: Justin Heiman
text: Dr pepper was cold.

name: ESTEBAN GARCIA
text: Great pizza

name: Candi Rust
text: Had a Groupon but the pizza was so so.
